scenario_text.value: Is this a river?

The footprints led us here, so they must have
come this way...
But there are no footprints on the other side!

They might have used the river to lose the
trail. That was clever, but...
Didn’t they just get swept away?
Kewww?!
Oh no! We have to save them!
Yes, let’s hurry!

Hang on! They might’ve gotten away!
We should look for another path!
I agree with Minoru.

I’m a little worried that we haven’t found
the dam yet...
What should we do, Takuma?

(Did they get swept away or find another path?
Does this even look plausible to begin with?)
(How can we follow after them?)
Maybe they got swept away.
Did we fall for a trick?
Let’s look for another path.

It would be terrible if they were swept away.
Let’s go check.
I know. You’re right.
Is this okay? We’re not wasting time?

It won’t be a waste if we find out they
haven’t drowned.
What if we were tricked by Gomamon?
Huh?!

I was wondering about that... If that’s what
this is, we need to go back.

No way...
What should we believe?

If there was a risk of drowning, they
wouldn’t try crossing. They went another way.
You’re right! They must be okay!
But where is that other way?

Hey, you guys!
What are you doing here?
It’s Gomamon!

We were following the footprints of the kids
we told you about. We got to the river...
What? Weren’t you headed for the dam?
That’s right!
We couldn’t find the way there!

That’s right! I completely forgot!
It’s really hard to find!

There’s only one way to the dam:
the <color=#B41919>canal</color> over here!

Thank goodness!
There is a way?

There is indeed, and I’ll show you.
I owe it to you!
Then let’s go now.
Yes, show us the way!
It’s this way! Follow me!
